Cambodia: Indravarman II died. Jayavarman VIII succeeded him.
India: Narasingha Deva I ruler of the Eastern Ganga dynasty defeats Tughral Tughan Khan of the Mamluk Sultanate of Delhi in the Battle of Katasin and annexes several districts of Bengal into his empire.
Spain: Ferdinand the Saint captured Orihuela and obtained the vassalage of Murcia.
